name: Starbound
descr:
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/211820/extras/banner_1.gif?t=1730828214[/img]

In Starbound, you create your own story - there’s no wrong way to play! You may choose to save the universe from the forces that destroyed your home, uncovering greater galactic mysteries in the process, or you may wish to forego a heroic journey entirely in favor of colonizing uncharted planets.

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/211820/extras/banner_2.gif?t=1730828214[/img]

Settle down and farm the land, become an intergalactic landlord, hop from planet to planet collecting rare creatures, or delve into dangerous dungeons and lay claim to extraordinary treasures.

Discover ancient temples and modern metropolises, trees with eyes, and mischievous penguins. Make use of hundreds of materials and over two thousand objects to build a sleepy secluded cabin in the woods, a medieval castle, underwater arcade, or even a space station.

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/211820/extras/banner_3.gif?t=1730828214[/img]

Starbound has been built from the ground up to be multiplayer and easily moddable. You have the tools to make the universe your own and modify the game to suit your play style - add new items, races, planet types, dungeons, and quests - the possibilities are limitless.

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/211820/extras/banner_4.gif?t=1730828214[/img]

[list][li]Choose from one of 7 playable races and customize your character
[/li][li]Save the universe in an epic story campaign featuring colorful characters, bosses, dungeons, and quests!
[/li][li]You're the captain of your very own starship! Decorate it, expand it, and use it to explore a procedurally generated universe
[/li][li]Colonize uncharted planets and collect gifts from your tenants - if they like you, they may even ask to join your ship crew!
[/li][li]Three game modes - Casual (no need to eat), Survival (eat to survive/drop items on death) and Hardcore (permadeath)
[/li][li]Craft thousands of objects - building materials, armor, weapons, furniture and more
[/li][li]Capture unique monsters to fight alongside you
[/li][li]All content is available in online drop-in/drop-out co-op
[/li][li]Built from the ground up to be easily moddable. You have the tools to make the universe however you'd like it[/li][/list][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/211820/extras/1_4_monsters_animated.gif?t=1730828214[/img]
detail:
名称: Starbound
类型: 动作, 冒险, 休闲, 独立, 角色扮演
开发商: Chucklefish
发行商: Chucklefish
系列: Chucklefish
发行日期: 2016 年 7 月 22 日
review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (316) - 过去 30 天内的 316 篇用户评测中有 84% 为好评。 此产品在一个或多个时间段内出现跑题评测活动。这些时间段内的评测已按您的偏好设置不计入此产品的评测分数。
全部评测: 特别好评 (85,544) * - 此游戏的 85,544 篇用户评测中有 90% 为好评。 此产品在一个或多个时间段内出现跑题评测活动。这些时间段内的评测已按您的偏好设置不计入此产品的评测分数。
全部评测: 特别好评 * (85,544 篇中的 90%) 发布至今
最近评测: 特别好评 (316 篇中的 84%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows XP or later
处理器: Core 2 Duo
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: 256 MB graphics memory and directx 9.0c compatible gpu
DirectX 版本: 9.0c
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows XP or later
处理器: Core i3
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: Discrete GPU capable of directx 9.0c
DirectX 版本: 9.0c
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X

处理器: 64 bit Intel CPU
内存: 2 GB RAM
